title: Iglesia de Nuestra Señora de las Victorias
description: Known as the Church of Our Lady of Victories, is a significant landmark in Tetouan, reflecting its rich cultural heritage.

title: Oued Laou Beach
description: Oued Laou Beach offers serene coastal views and is a popular spot for relaxation and water activities in Tetouan.

title: Capo negro Beach
description: Capo Negro Beach is renowned for its picturesque shores and tranquil ambiance, attracting visitors seeking sun, sand, and sea.

title: Riad Tetuanía
description: Offers traditional Moroccan hospitality in a charming setting, providing guests with an authentic cultural experience.

title: Riad Tetouan
description: Blends modern comfort with traditional Moroccan architecture, offering guests a relaxing stay in the heart of the city.

title: Dar dbagh
description: A historical site showcasing Tetouan's leather tanning industry, providing insight into the city's economic and cultural heritage.

title: Royal Palace
description: stands as a symbol of Tetouan's royal history, offering visitors a glimpse into the city's regal past and architectural grandeur.

title: Modern Art Center of Tetouan
description: showcases contemporary artistic expressions, contributing to the city's vibrant cultural scene.

title: bouanane
description: scenic natural landscapes and is a popular destination for outdoor enthusiasts and nature lovers in Tetouan.

title: zarka
description: a tranquil retreat surrounded by lush greenery, providing visitors with a peaceful escape from the hustle and bustle of city life.

title: Dar El Oddi
description: an ethnographic museum that preserves and showcases Tetouan's cultural heritage through its diverse collection of artifacts and exhibits.

title: Dar El Oddi
description: offers visitors an immersive journey into Tetouan's past, highlighting the city's rich history and cultural traditions.

title: Cafe Flower
description: Cafe Flower is a cozy establishment where visitors can enjoy delicious Moroccan cuisine and aromatic teas in a relaxing atmosphere.

title: Feddan Park
description: Feddan Park is a green oasis in Tetouan, offering locals and tourists a serene environment for picnics, leisurely strolls, and recreational activities.

title: Hassan II Square
description: Hassan II Square is a central plaza in Tetouan surrounded by shops, cafes, and historical buildings, serving as a bustling hub of activity and commerce.
